review_title: Pricey but well worth the investment! My favorite EDC light.
reviews:
No joke- I've been researching tactical flashlights for months. There are ridiculously too many from which to choose. I was getting quite frustrated finding the perfect model. So finally after hours upon hours of research I decided upon the Acebeam L16 and I'm quite happy with my choice. Here are the deciding factors:
1. Really is as bright as claims, about twice as bright as your cheap tactical lights.
2. USB rechargeable, therefore I can charge from my car or my portable solar array for charging USB devices while camping. Almost infinite lighting without carrying around spare batteries. Eventually the rechargeable batteries will need replaced but not for years I expect.
3. 5 year warranty. Check closely and you'll notice a lot of high end lights do not have this.

reviews:
Hand down the best tactical light on the market. I own several high end lights, Olight, Fenix, Surefire, Imalent etc....

This is a true tactical light. Momentary turbo from the tailcap and full click to remain in Turbo. All we get from the tailcap is turbo and that is what a tactical light is supposed to be.

The throw at 90,000 candela is amazing with exceptional spill. Itâ€™s perfect for all situation when you need to reach out and touch someone and provide sufficient spill.

The light is a home run and I donâ€™t have any personal issue with it whatsoever. Iâ€™d highly recommend it to any law enforcement personal.

reviews: Acebeam thought of everything. I can not find a single flaw with this flashlight. It's high quality, nothing loose or rattling, amazing throw and spill packed into a small package that fits comfortably in your hand or pocket. Never imagined I would spend more than $40 for a flashlight but I am very happy with my purchase. Worth every penny.

reviews: My flashlight gets turned on while I'm working. It is in the case attached to my belt. I have tried putting the light in -either light-side up and light-side down. It made no difference. Can someone let me know if there is a fix? I am very happy with the brightness of the light.
